name: SAVING THE WORLD, ONE INTERN AT A TIME
name_original: SAVING THE WORLD, ONE INTERN AT A TIME
description:
You're the new intern in a secret organisation in charge of the management of the Earth. Do your best to get used to the job on your own and avoid global panic.

If you don't succeed, well... I guess we will just have to find another intern.

How to play

Keyboard only.

Press M to play music. Figure out the rest on you own.

:)

Credits : 

Game Designers : 

LINUESA Lola - Game designer, artist

CREPEL Clément - Artist, Lead programmer, game designer

VELIA Arnaud - Game designer
